Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitUserDAOImpl
public interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit User Data Access Object (DAO) operations. Provides methods to manage user details, including adding users, updating passwords, and retrieving users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(FlipFitUser user)
    Adds a new user to the system.
    FlipFitUser
    findByUsername(String username)
    Finds a user by their username.
    void
    updateAddress(String gymOwnerId, String address)
    Updates the address for a gym owner.
    void
    updatePassword(String userId, String password)
    Updates the password for an existing user.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(FlipFitUser user) throws ExistingUserException
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The FlipFitUser object representing the user to be added.
      Throws:
      ExistingUserException - If a user with the same username or details already exists.

    • updatePassword

      void updatePassword(String userId, String password) throws InvalidUserException
      Updates the password for an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose password is to be updated.
      password - The new password for the user.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - If the user ID is invalid or the user is not found.

    • updateAddress

      void updateAddress(String gymOwnerId, String address) throws InvalidUserException
      Updates the address for a gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - The ID of the gym owner whose address is to be updated.
      address - The new address for the gym owner.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - If the gym owner ID is invalid or the user is not found.

    • findByUsername

      FlipFitUser findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The FlipFitUser object representing the user if found, otherwise null.
